summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from July 1 to July 31, 2017. It details various transactions, including significant outgoing transfers and interest payments, highlighting the financial activities associated with the account during this period.

events.title: Account Summary Start
events.description: Beginning balance and transactions for the account starting from July 1, 2017.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: A transfer of $1,000,000.00 was made from the account.

events.title: Multiple Outgoing Transfers
events.description: Two outgoing transfers totaling $4,250,000.00 were made to different accounts.

events.title: Account Summary End
events.description: Ending balance and interest payment for the account as of July 31, 2017.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St. Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The document details account transactions for Deutsche Bank from July 1 to July 31, 2017.
A total of $8,250,000.00 was transferred out of the account during this period.
Interest earned during this period was $2,122.09.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors on the account statement.
There are multiple outgoing transfers to other banks, including JPMorgan and Silicon Valley Bank.
